class.name: UnitSphereRandomVectorGeneratorTest

javadoc.text: Test the distribution of points from {@link UnitSphereRandomVectorGenerator#nextVector()}in two dimensions.

method.name: test2DDistribution
method.comment: In 2D, angles with a given vector should be uniformly distributed
Cosine of angle is their dot product, because both are unit length
Dot product here is just the first element of the vector by construction
Simplistic test for roughly even distribution
